title: How to dress up for different occasions this Diwali
text:
Festive season comes with

the

added pressure of looking presentable at every event. Besides impressing the long list of relatives and your secret office crush with your sartorial choices, you also need to get some Instagram-worthy shots for the grid. To make all your festive looks distinctive from one another, you need to strategically plan your wardrobe for all the different occasions you've sent an RSVP to.

While you can wear a long and flowing Anarkali for

a

p

uja, you can dial it up a notch by opting for an elegant sari to the late-night card party. Keep it contemporary for the office party with an angarakha styled kurta, and bring out the big guns (voluminous lehenga) for the main soiree. Here’s our edit of all the celebrity-approved festive ensembles you can take inspiration from.
description: Confused about what to wear for different events this Diwali? Athiya Shetty and Shraddha Kapoor giving us lessons on the versatile festive dressing.
